entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this morning. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 24. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
